author: Simon Difford
description: Whiter than white (actually "white wine" golden) yet mysterious. As for the taste, white wine acidity balances rich elderflower with spirituous lacing from apple brandy and aromatic grapey pisco. Should be stirred, but this cocktail does benefit from the dilution and aeration imparted by shaking.
name: The StiG

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
